<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This utility class tracks the length of a stackmap instruction&#39;s &#39;shadow&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is used by the X86AsmPrinter to ensure that the stackmap shadow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// invariants (i.e. no other stackmaps, patchpoints, or control flow within</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the shadow) are met, while outputting a minimal number of NOPs for padding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To minimise the number of NOPs used, the shadow tracker counts the number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of instruction bytes output since the last stackmap. Only if there are too</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// few instruction bytes to cover the shadow are NOPs used for padding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">StackMapShadowTracker &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recently encountered STACKMAP instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recently encountered STACKMAP, stopping when that number is greater than</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
